data.message: Can you please show NEWS in my News Feed?  It looks more like my TIME LINE with 3-day-old posts!  Also...why do you censor posts from The Huffington Post and Time in your news feed?

replies.message: Hello The Gospel of Hemp. You can adjust what you see in your News Feed by choosing to view stories in the order they're posted, by hiding stories you don't want to see, by following or unfollowing friends and by using friends lists. Learn more at: http://on.fb.me/1oHZGBS -Sarah
Wow, really?  Those "look what the Zionists " are posting what ever they want. I got into trouble for posting a few "no GMO " posts!  Haha
